subject: Manchester United News & A Special PaperCo Offer for You!
html_email:
Hi Sophia,

Hope you’re well—exciting times for Manchester United fans, with both Garnacho and Højlund in the headlines lately! With some big matches coming up and maybe a visit to Burger Palace on your mind, I wanted to let you know we have a new premium subscription at PaperCo: you’ll get 10% off all your paper orders, no matter how busy your wholesale business gets.

Let me know if you’re interested or have any questions—cheering on United together just got a little sweeter!

All the best,
[Your Name] at PaperCo
